description:
A revolutionary groupset shout get a revolutionary chain. SRAM rethought the standard chain, creating a flattop linkage that runs incredibly smoothly. A narrow profile lets this flattop chain glide easily up and down 12-speed cassettes and provides much quieter operation.

  • Flattop design allows the chain to be narrower, making wider gear ranges possible
  • Quieter than standard chains
  • Compatible with SRAM 12-speed road groupsets
  • Solid pin construction is strong and durable
  • Flattop Powerlock chain connector for better chain guiding and longevity
  • Hard chrome plated inner and outer plates reduce frcition and are harder for dirt and grime to stick to
name: SRAM Force AXS D1 12-Speed Chain
